name: Poltergeist
trait:
'A Poltergeist can throw objects faster and further than other ghosts. 
Also it will throw an item every 0.5 seconds during a hunt (other ghosts do it with 50% chance).

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
ability:
**A Poltergeist can throw multiple objects at once.** 
This is called a multithrow, and it drains sanity. 
A multithrow will make some loud noise, and the activity chart in the van will show a short and tall spike. 2% sanity drain per object thrown of all players around the ghost
